scope: Primary Etsy Store Reboot & Alpha Generation Strategy
strategy_name: The Alpha Playbook: High-Profit, Low-Traffic Launch
principles: Prioritize low-competition, high-intent micro-niches identified by DATA_INTEGRITY_L001.
Target premium price points ($4.00 - $5.00+) using Flux.1/SD 3.5 Medium quality.
Initial focus must be on maximizing conversion (sales/view) before addressing external SEO (traffic).
Leverage ComfyUI/OpenPose skills for unique, high-fidelity assets that competitors cannot easily replicate.
seo_mandates: All new listings must begin the title with the exact highest-alpha keyword.
Tags must utilize the full 13-tag capacity, mixing long-tail and broad terms.
social_media_mandates: Focus X/Twitter promotion solely on high-value, high-fidelity visual assets (final listing images/mockups).
Initial goal is proof-of-concept, not sales. Must drive traffic back to a specific listing URL for Etsy's algorithm.
